meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny!

Get ready to grab your board and hit the pavement (or should I say, the digital streets?) because Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 is here to bring the nostalgia, the thrill, and the satisfaction of pulling off sick combos like never before!

As expected from a game that's been remastered with love, this iconic title has lost none of its charm. The gameplay remains as smooth as ever, and the levels have been lovingly recreated to transport you back to the golden era of skate culture.

But let's not just rely on nostalgia alone (although, who can deny the sweet feels of revisiting childhood faves?). No way! This remaster has also got some ace new features that'll keep you hooked. Think extra challenges, a revamped level design, and an online multiplayer mode to shred with friends!

Now, I know what you're thinking: "Is it just a rehash of the old games?" Fear not, young skaters! The devs have done their homework, injecting modern flair without compromising the originals' essence.

Of course, there are some naysayers out there (looking at you, cynics!), but honestly, who can blame Activision for wanting to milk this cash cow? After all, it's a winning formula that's aged surprisingly well!

Now, if I were to nitpick, I'd say the load times could be snappier and some of the older levels might feel a tad dated. BUT, hey, those are tiny quibbles in an otherwise fantastic package.

So, what are you waiting for? Get ready to relive (or experience for the first time) the magic of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2!

P.S. Special shoutout to IGN and Gaming Age for being the most... enthusiastic about this remaster.
